title: Update CLAUDE.md with backend quality gates
description: Add backend quality gates section to CLAUDE.md. Include: lint (`cd src/backend && ruff check .`), test (`cd src/backend && python -m pytest`). Document that backend tests require PostgreSQL running via docker-compose.
acceptance_criteria:
- CLAUDE.md Quality Gates section updated
- Backend lint command added
- Backend test command added
- Note about PostgreSQL requirement added
